Package com.wedriveu.services.vehicle.control

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BookingControl
    This Controller serves some interaction requests with the VehicleStore database.
    BookingSessionManager
    Control AbstractVerticle that manages a Vehicle booking session, so it sends messages to confirm the vehicle BookVehicleResponse and sends to the vehicle the DriveCommand through the proper boundaries, that are BookPublisherVerticle and StartDrivingPublisherVerticle.
    NearestControl
    This Controller serves some interaction requests with the VehicleStore database.
    SubstitutionChecker
    This AbstractVerticle manages a Vehicle SubstitutionCheck, so it gets the Booking positions associated to the Vehicle to be substituted through the proper boundary that is the GetBookingPositionsVerticle, makes its checks and sends back the result to the SubstitutionControl.
    SubstitutionControl
    This AbstractVerticle manages the whole Vehicle SubstitutionRequest process, so when a SubstitutionCheck indicates that a substitution is needed, it finds the substitution Vehicle by delegating the find-process to the NearestControl.
    UpdateControl
    This AbstractVerticle manages the VehicleUpdate, if there is an update with status Constants.Vehicle#STATUS_BROKEN_STOLEN it delegates the substitution process to the SubstitutionControl.
    VerticleDeployer
    Deploys the whole Verticle collection once.
